issue.message: Unexpected text found in layout file: "android:autoMirrored="true">"
Use `ResourcesCompat.getDrawable()`
Unnecessary; SDK_INT is always >= 23
This folder configuration (`v23`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 23. Merge all the resources in this folder into `values`.
